name: 星之传说
description:
action RPG,

There are eight kinds of magic in the game. Different levels unlock different magics, and cooperate with each other to find the best strategy to clear the level.

There are three types of weapons: line guns, scatter bombs and range bombs. Linear cannons have the highest single attack. The power of the scatter projectile is second, and the power of the range projectile is the smallest. After obtaining the energy, the different attributes, shapes and ballistics of the projectile can be activated.
Dozens of props, including blood and blue, attribute enhancement, etc. With skills, different play styles can be derived.
feature:


1 Use the latest self-developed rendering technology, light and shadow technology, rendering technology, time-lapse effect, flower and grass particle effect to build a lifelike and dreamy world.
2 Each enemy is originally designed with smooth animation to match its own characteristics.
3 Professional companies have made dozens of tracks to better enhance the atmosphere of the game
4 Originally designed magic particle effects to create a better fighting atmosphere.
5 Rich weapons, reasonable matching, improve the fun of the game.
6 kinds of weapons are available for character selection, and reasonable matching can produce strange effects
7 Guess the different weaknesses of the character, test the player's intuition and strategy.
8 According to the enemy's different skill attack methods, different resistant weapons and magic are adopted to test the player's intuition, strategy and observation.
9 Fun mini-tasks increase the purpose and interest of the game.
